title: What are essays good for? - Quora

response.answer_text: Essay writing has important skills development and educational functions. It allows you to practise and develop transferable skills that are valuable to you not only while you're a student but also when you graduate and have to write in a professional role.

Three things make a great article The writer's style of writing Believe the author in each article To be able to write so that he can move the reader to a number of places in one article writes in the same article ridicule and criticism, laughter and crying so saturate the reader and leave in his mind a good impression
